item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, April 26, 2024 at 11:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Alphabet set to surge past $2tn valuation as it announces first dividend
2. Military briefing: Russia’s narrowing advantage in Ukraine
3. Harvey Weinstein’s rape conviction in New York overturned on appeal
4. Biden dealt blow as investors scale back bets on pre-election rate cut
5. Anglo American rejects ‘highly unattractive’ BHP offer
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, April 26, 2024 at 11:20 AM UTC
